text: Illiopolis is a village in Sangamon County, Illinois, United States. The population was 846 at the 2020 census. It is part of the Springfield, Illinois Metropolitan Statistical Area. Illiopolis is located at (39.851351, -89.247131). The name was formed from Illinois and -polis, a Greek suffix meaning "city". ==References== Category:Villages in Illinois
title: Illiopolis, Illinois
